short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you want to practice your perfect squares? Then this is what you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to practice your perfect squares by answering questions. Try to build up your streak, too. You can check the table of Perfect Squares if you haven't memorized them.
